SELECT my_view.provide_dep, my_view.provide_dep_name,my_view.should_pro_nums,my_view.already_pro_nums,my_view.not_pro_nums, my_view.applied_for_nums,my_view.first_trial_nums,my_view.confirmed_nums, my_view.rescinded_nums FROM (SELECT td.provide_dep, pd.name AS provide_dep_name, COUNT(should_pro.demand_id) AS should_pro_nums,COUNT(already_pro.demand_id) AS already_pro_nums,
COUNT(should_pro.demand_id) - COUNT(already_pro.demand_id) AS not_pro_nums, COUNT(applied_for.demand_id) AS applied_for_nums,COUNT(first_trial.demand_id) AS first_trial_nums, COUNT(confirmed.demand_id) AS confirmed_nums, COUNT(rescinded.demand_id) AS rescinded_nums FROM t_demand td LEFT JOIN pub_organ pd ON td.provide_dep = pd.code AND pd.STATUS = '1'
LEFT JOIN (SELECT tdo.demand_id FROM t_demand_operate tdo WHERE tdo.state IN ('01','02','03','04','05','06')
AND tdo.operate_time >= CONCAT(#{stratDate},' 00:00:00')
AND tdo.operate_time <= CONCAT(#{endDate},' 23:59:59')
GROUP BY tdo.demand_id) should_pro ON td.demand_id = should_pro.demand_id
LEFT JOIN (SELECT tdo.demand_id FROM t_demand_operate tdo WHERE tdo.state IN ('06')
AND tdo.operate_time >= CONCAT(#{stratDate},' 00:00:00')
AND tdo.operate_time <= CONCAT(#{endDate},' 23:59:59')
GROUP BY tdo.demand_id) already_pro ON td.demand_id = already_pro.demand_id
LEFT JOIN (SELECT tdo.demand_id FROM t_demand_operate tdo WHERE tdo.state IN ('01','02','03','04','05','06','07')
AND tdo.operate_time >= CONCAT(#{stratDate},' 00:00:00')
AND tdo.operate_time <= CONCAT(#{endDate},' 23:59:59')
GROUP BY tdo.demand_id) applied_for ON td.demand_id = applied_for.demand_id
LEFT JOIN (SELECT tdo.demand_id FROM t_demand_operate tdo WHERE tdo.state IN ('02','03','04','05','06','07')
AND tdo.operate_time >= CONCAT(#{stratDate},' 00:00:00')
AND tdo.operate_time <= CONCAT(#{endDate},' 23:59:59')
GROUP BY tdo.demand_id) first_trial ON td.demand_id = first_trial.demand_id
LEFT JOIN (SELECT tdo.demand_id FROM t_demand_operate tdo WHERE tdo.state IN ('04','05','06','07')
AND tdo.operate_time >= CONCAT(#{stratDate},' 00:00:00')
AND tdo.operate_time <= CONCAT(#{endDate},' 23:59:59')
GROUP BY tdo.demand_id) confirmed ON td.demand_id = confirmed.demand_id
LEFT JOIN (SELECT tdo.demand_id FROM t_demand_operate tdo WHERE tdo.state IN ('07')
AND tdo.operate_time >= CONCAT(#{stratDate},' 00:00:00')
AND tdo.operate_time <= CONCAT(#{endDate},' 23:59:59')
GROUP BY tdo.demand_id) rescinded ON td.demand_id = rescinded.demand_id WHERE 1=1
AND td.provide_dep = #{provideDep}
GROUP BY td.provide_dep, pd.name) my_view
order by ${sidx} ${sord}

SELECT td.demand_id,td.demand_dep, dd.name AS demand_dep_name, td.provide_dep, pd.name AS provide_dep_name,td.demand_name,td.key_word,td.demand_detail, td.access_mode,am.par_name AS access_mode_name,td.serve_mode,sm.par_name AS serve_mode_name, td.frequency,f.par_name AS frequency_name,td.state,s.par_name AS state_name, td.demand_use,td.save_time,td.creater, pu.name as creater_name,pu.account,pu.mobile,td.remark FROM t_demand td LEFT JOIN pub_organ dd ON td.demand_dep = dd.CODE AND dd.STATUS = '1' LEFT JOIN pub_organ pd ON td.provide_dep = pd.code AND pd.STATUS = '1' LEFT JOIN pub_user pu ON td.creater = pu.id LEFT JOIN t_parameter am ON am.par_code = 'T_DEMAND|ACCESS_MODE' AND td.access_mode = am.par_value LEFT JOIN t_parameter sm ON sm.par_code = 'T_DEMAND|SERVE_MODE' AND td.serve_mode = sm.par_value LEFT JOIN t_parameter f ON f.par_code = 'T_DEMAND|FREQUENCY' AND td.frequency = f.par_value LEFT JOIN t_parameter s ON s.par_code = 'T_DEMAND|STATE' AND td.state = s.par_value WHERE td.demand_id = #{value}

AND demand_dep = #{demandDep}, AND provide_dep = #{provideDep}, AND demand_name = #{demandName}, AND key_word = #{keyWord}, AND demand_detail = #{demandDetail}, AND access_mode = #{accessMode}, AND serve_mode = #{serveMode}, AND frequency = #{frequency}, AND demand_use = #{demandUse}, AND save_time = #{saveTime}, AND creater = #{creater}, AND state = #{state}, AND remark = #{remark}
